docs.snippet: President Donald Trump asked a federal judge on Monday to order private arbitration in a case brought by a porn actress who claimed she had an affair with him.

headline.main: Trump Seeks Arbitration in Stormy Daniels Case
headline.print_headline: Trump Seeks Arbitration in Stormy Daniels Case

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump's plan to deploy National Guard troops to the Mexico border has drawn resistance from some governors, most of them Democrats, and the law he invoked creates an opening for them to turn him down, officials said Friday.

headline.main: Trump Troop Request Creates Opening for Governors to Say No
headline.print_headline: Trump Troop Request Creates Opening for Governors to Say No

docs.snippet: The civil rights leader answered questions about his experience in the struggle for equal rights and the current state of the nation.

headline.main: Jesse Jackson on Race Relations, Trump and the Right to Vote
headline.print_headline: Jesse Jackson on Race Relations, Trump and the Right to Vote

docs.snippet: European shares fell on Friday after U.S. President Donald Trump warned of further tariffs on China, although the losses were limited by gains among defensive stocks like utilities.

headline.main: European Shares Dip on Latest Trump Tariff Threat
headline.print_headline: European Shares Dip on Latest Trump Tariff Threat

docs.snippet: The following statements were posted to the verified Twitter accounts of U.S. President Donald Trump, @realDonaldTrump and @POTUS.

In a story April 3 about President Donald Trump announcing that he wants to use the military to secure the border, The Associated Press reported erroneously the length of the U.S.-Mexico border in Texas. It is roughly 1,250 miles (2,000 kilometers...

headline.main: Correction: Trump Story on Securing US-Mexico Border
headline.print_headline: Correction: Trump Story on Securing US-Mexico Border

docs.snippet: White House officials sounded increasingly doubtful Thursday about the future of embattled Environmental Protection Agency chief Scott Pruitt, even as President Donald Trump appeared to throw him a public lifeline.

headline.main: Trump Expresses Confidence in EPA Chief as Questions Linger
headline.print_headline: Trump Expresses Confidence in EPA Chief as Questions Linger

docs.snippet: There is no better illustration of Mr. Trump’s impact on the midterm campaign than in the soaring number of Democratic House candidates in the primaries.

headline.main: Democrats’ Best Recruitment Tool? President Trump

byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN and DENISE LU

docs.snippet: The activist, comedian and author spoke about women, power and privilege in an interview with Megan Twohey of The New York Times.

headline.main: Chelsea Handler: The #MeToo Movement Is a ‘Complete Referendum’ on Trump
